questions.name: Proxy respondent validation
questions.label: The survey should be completed by a person in your household 16 years of age or older who is familiar with your household’s weekday travel. Are you that person?

questions.name: Guardian comfirmation
questions.label:
This survey must be completed by someone 16 years of age or older who is familiar with your household’s weekday travel. The survey may only be completed by someone under the age of 16 if consent is provided by their parent or legal guardian. Please have a parent or legal guardian review and answer the following question before proceeding:

The goal of the Transportation Tomorrow Survey is to help your Provincial and Municipal Governments make improvements to roads and public transport in your area. To do this, the survey collects information on existing household travel patterns. All the information you provide is strictly confidential.

questions.name: Advance letter
questions.label: Do you recall receiving a letter from the Ministry of Transportation regarding the Transportation Tomorrow Survey?

questions.name: Contact consent
questions.label: We would like to be able to contact you in the event we need to verify any of your responses. Please verify if you want to provide your contact information to us. This information will be kept confidential and will not be shared with anyone. We will contact you only in the event we need to verify your responses. Your contact information will be permanently deleted once the survey is concluded.

questions.name: Cell phone household
questions.label: What telephone service(s) do you have in your household? (select all that apply)

questions.name: Household location
questions.label: Please identify the location of your household by clicking on the map and/or using the search function below.

questions.name: House types
questions.label:
Is this address a house, townhouse, or apartment?
(If a condominium, select either Townhouse or Apartment as best fits.)

questions.name: Household size
questions.label: How many people, including yourself, live in your household?

questions.name: Household vehicle
questions.label:
How many vehicles does your household have available for personal use? Please include personal and business vehicles (including cars, light trucks, vans, and motorcycles). 

Do not count heavy trucks, motor-homes, Recreational Vehicles (RVs), schoolbuses, or bicycles.
Do not count vehicles that are not licensed or are inoperable

(Answer ‘Employed if self-employed)

Is {{ respondentName }} a full-time or part-time student?

Currently enrolled at an academic institution. Includes K-12, post-secondary, evening classes for academic and vocational training (but not sports/recreation classes).

questions.name: Transit pass
questions.label:
Does {{ respondentName }} have monthly or annual transit pass? (Please check all that apply)

Do not take tickets or weekly passes into account.

questions.name: Carshare membership
questions.label: Is {{ respondentName }} a member of any car sharing service?

questions.name: Made trips yesterday
questions.label:
Did {{ respondentName }} make any trip between {{yesterday}} 4:00AM and {{today}} 3:59AM?

You make a trip when you move from one location to another (e.g. home to work, work to daycare) using one or more modes (walking outside, bike, transit, car, etc.). Note that travel with no change in destination (e.g. walking a dog) are not considered trips.

questions.name: Reason for nor making trips
questions.label: Please indict the reason for not making any trips on the day?

questions.name: Timeline
questions.label: Please add all the places {{ respondentName }} visited yesterday to the shelf below by clicking on the "Add new location" button. Then drag and drop the added locations to the timeline to create the correct sequence of visiting those places.

configuration.purpose: "home | usual work location | work-related/business meeting | school/education | school-related/school-trip | restaurant, bar, coffee | visiting friends, family | recreation, sports, leisure, arts | worship, religion | health and personal care | drop someone off | pick someone up | daycare | education (including TA/RA work) | shopping and errands (groceries, corner store, shopping center, gas station, etc.) | services (bank, hairdresser, lawyer, notary, mechanic, etc.) | other"

questions.name: Household income
questions.label:
Which of the following ranges corresponds to your household's total income last year? Consider all sources of income before income taxes.

﻿This information is used for transportation planning purposes, to get a better understanding of households and travel patterns. Your answers will remain entirely confidential.

questions.name: Future study
questions.label:
Would you be willing to be contacted to participate in future transportation-related research?

Contact information you provide will only be used to contact you for future transportation-related research conducted by the Ministry of Transportation of Ontario, University of Toronto, or one of the agencies or municipalities which have partnered on this survey. Your contact information will never be sold or shared with any other agency, or used for any other purpose other than to invite you to participate in research in the future.

Personal information is collected on behalf of the Ministry of Transportation under the authority of section 205 of the Highway Traffic Act. If you have any questions, please contact Khandker M. Nurul Habib, PhD, PEng, Associate Professor (Transportation), Department of Civil Engineering, University of Toronto, Toronto, M5S1A4, Room: SF 3001F, Phone: 416-946-8027, Fax:  416-978-6813, Email: khandker.nurulhabib@utoronto.ca.
